title: Seduced by my Wife's Sister: The Brat
description: When Jason opts out of the usual Sunday afternoon of lunch at a fast food restaurant and a playtime at the park with the wife and kids, hoping to catch some rare time to relax alone at home, the last thing he expected was to walk in on a hot woman getting herself off on his couch! But maybe he shouldn’t be all that surprised. After all, with his wife’s wild younger sister, Lola, staying with them, anything is possible. And it looks like he won’t be getting much relaxing. But now, his blood racing straight to his groin seems to have other ideas for him. And so does Lola.*** WARNING!!! This book contains sexually explicit material and is NOT intended for readers below the age of Eighteen!
author: Anastasia  Rose
